com.caverock.androidsvg

Class CSSParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.caverock.androidsvg.CSSParser

  • public class CSSParser
extends java.lang.Object
    A very simple CSS parser that is not very compliant with the CSS spec but hopefully parses almost all the CSS we are likely to strike in an SVG file. The main goals are to (a) be small, and (b) parse the CSS in a Corel Draw SVG file.
